title: Reynolds Says Baseball Has to Think About its Future
itunes:title: Reynolds Says Baseball Has to Think About its Future
description:
Harold Reynolds joins us from Texas, where the the World Series is in full swing. The former All-Star turned MLB Network analyst says Covid has affected not only the big leagues, but the ecosystem underneath, including the minor leagues and the NCAA. Changes --financial and even in-game -- loom large in 2021, and Reynolds even takes a beat to marvel at Lynchie's authentic Boston accent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
